title: My Orianna skin concept!
body:
It's called Orihanna !

Rito if you put this skin on sale, everyone would buy it!!

EDIT: Thank you for all your support! I'm gonna create another skin as this one received so much attention! I'm so glad you like them! :D

replies.body:
This skin is a bad idea because then she could get easily beaten and abused in lane by someone...

That someone being OChrisBrown.

I'd buy it.
Void Fizz was player creation, this is a player mistake.
And here I am, waiting for Chosen Yasuo. Would make a sick Jedi/Sith. God I love Star Trek.
Honestly, Gandalf is the best character in Naruto in my opinion.
How about a Kaceytron Syndra skin?
